title: Manual Control Logic Function
description: This function determines the state of the manual control based on the input signals. It sets the MANUAL output to TRUE if the OFF signal is not active and either the IN or ON signal is active.
name: ManualControlLogic

input.name: IN
input.description: Input signal indicating the current state. This signal is involved in the logical operation.

input.name: ON
input.description: Input signal that, when TRUE, contributes to activating the manual control.

input.name: OFF
input.description: Input signal that, when TRUE, deactivates the manual control.

output.name: MANUAL
output.description: Output of the function indicating the state of the manual control, TRUE if the manual control is active.

return_value.description: Returns the state of the MANUAL control determined by the logical conditions of the input parameters.
